sentences.en: After the Norman Conquest the forest became a royal hunting preserve.
sentences.cn: 诺曼征服之后，这片森林成为了皇家狩猎区。

sentences.en: All the royal cars are fitted with electronic homing devices.
sentences.cn: 所有的皇家轿车都装有电子自导引装置。

sentences.en: Banks spent his national service in the Royal Navy.
sentences.cn: 班克斯在皇家海军服过兵役。

sentences.en: Bessie, resplendent in royal blue velvet, was hovering beside the table.
sentences.cn: 贝茜身穿华丽的深蓝色天鹅绒衣服，在桌旁徘徊。

sentences.en: By 1936 she was exhibiting at the Royal Academy.
sentences.cn: 到1936年她已在皇家艺术学院展出作品。

sentences.en: He gave his imitation of Queen Elizabeth's royal wave.
sentences.cn: 他模仿伊丽莎白女王挥手致意。

sentences.en: He rejoined Sadler's Wells Royal Ballet as Assistant Administrator in 1988.
sentences.cn: 他在1988年重回萨德勒的威尔斯皇家芭蕾舞团，任行政助理。

sentences.en: He was consultant rheumatologist at the Royal Hampshire Hospital.
sentences.cn: 他是皇家汉普郡医院的风湿病学顾问。

sentences.en: He was happy to book into the Royal Pavilion Hotel.
sentences.cn: 他很高兴能入住圣庭苑酒店。

sentences.en: Her Royal Highness has definite views about most things.
sentences.cn: 女王陛下对大多数事情都有明确的观点。

sentences.en: Television has irreversibly changed our perception of the Royal Family.
sentences.cn: 电视不可逆转地改变了我们对皇室的印象。

sentences.en: The Company received a commendation from the Royal Society of Arts.
sentences.cn: 公司受到了皇家艺术协会的赞扬。

sentences.en: The following year she joined the Royal Opera House.
sentences.cn: 次年她加入了皇家歌剧院。

sentences.en: there is no royal road to teaching.
We are beginning to muddle the extended royal family and the monarchy.
sentences.cn: 我们开始混淆皇室大家庭和君主制这两个概念了。

sentences.en: You can buy a formulation containing royal jelly, pollen and vitamin C.
sentences.cn: 可以买一种含蜂王浆、花粉和维生素C的配方产品。

words.tran_cn: 保皇主义的；保皇党人的
君主主义；保皇主义；忠君思想

phrases.tran_cn: 皇家艺术院；皇家艺术学会
捷径：毫无困难的方法或方式

trans.tran_en: relating to or belonging to a king or queen
a member of a royal family
